snippet.title: Bloodlines, an FE7 ROMhack by Faerghast, is OUT NOW! PLAY IT!
snippet.description:
BLOODLINES 3.0 is HERE! 
From its initial announcement that it was coming over a year ago, it is here, ready to be played. It’s been so long... thank you everyone for your kindness and patience. A lot has changed with the project and I’ll be around to make sure game-breaking bugs get resolved. 
Details:
Base game: Fire Emblem 7 (U)
Recommended Emulator: VBA (This was not tested on m-GBA or VBA-M, so you will most likely experience unintended bugs due to m-GBAs accuracy. This is your warning)
Contains 19 Chapters (It is not complete)
Additionally, I’ve created a public Bloodlines Discord. Here is where you can talk about the hacks features and whatnot in depth. All are welcome, just don’t be a stinky head.

https://discord.com/invite/e4N9ZvRNxm
https://feuniverse.us/t/bloodlines-3-19-public-beta-is-released-check-the-first-post/423
Patch download: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1nzAmkU7wV-iToNOwqnOD9zKfMMjlNN0v

Trailer Art:
James Kusardi: https://twitter.com/JSolKusardi
AAYellow: https://twitter.com/AAnimatorYellow

#Faerghast, #FireEmblem, #ROMhack
